item.title: Linking an NPC to a shop?
item.dc:creator: @joecooper joecooper
item.description:
@joecooper wrote:

well spawn the npc in your autospawn.cfg to were ever you want your shop e.g
spawn = 575 3341 3255 0 3342 3256 3340 3254 1 mall shop
the first number “575 is your npc id”
go to your shop.cfg and put the shop you want e.g
shop = 14 OUT_OF_STOCK 2 2 0333 0

now the 14 on “shop = 14” is your shop id
now you go into your client and search for auburys rune shop and under the wanneshop line hit enter and paste this

} else if (NPCID == 575) { //Boneman
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 39; // Bone Shop
and change the npc id to your npc id you spawned and change the wanneshop id to your shops id

hope this helped u

Read full topic
